XenotypeDef.label: bulwark
XenotypeDef.description: A winged, bird-like people molded to serve as guardians on airships or the mountainous regions of their planet. While not capable of long-term flight, they can glide and jump great distances and possess archites that allow them to heal allies in the vicinity.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: An archotech blessed race of winged-folk that serve as guardians.
